definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means

sentences.english: Make no expense but to do good to others or yourself; i. e. , waste nothing.
sentences.chinese: 花钱要花在利人利己的事情上，比如说，杜绝浪费。

sentences.english: We must do whatever we can to prevent realization of nuclear terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须尽我们的一切所能杜绝核恐怖问题的发生。

sentences.english: Their new accounting system will help clip the wings of any would-be embezzlers.
sentences.chinese: 他们的新会计制度有助于杜绝可能发生的贪污行为。

sentences.english: If you did that, you’d kill piracy. Probably.
sentences.chinese: 如果你这么干，你也许就可以杜绝盗版了。

sentences.english: So for high precision CNC machine tools, the collision must be eliminated.
sentences.chinese: 所以对于高精度数控机床来说，碰撞绝对要杜绝。

sentences.english: Sponging and taking more than one's share and extravagance and waste on the part of cadres must be banned.
sentences.chinese: 杜绝干部多吃多占和铺张浪费。

sentences.english: To learn to take care of every single thing personally, encounter.
sentences.chinese: 杜绝事必躬亲，学会抓大放小。

sentences.english: Eliminating the use of fishing gear that creates a high level incidental catch of non-target species.
sentences.chinese: 杜绝使用有很高几率捕获非目标鱼类的捕鱼装置。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To diminish and discontinue intra-hospital cross infection in oral medicine outpatient clinic.
sentences.chinese: 目的减少或杜绝口腔科门诊医院感染的发生。

sentences.english: It could eliminate the tax elusion by way of false divorce.
sentences.chinese: 人均住房面积标准可以杜绝‘假离婚避税法’。

sentences.english: Buys the body self-respect, ceases the improper sex act, is Guan Rui who prevents this sickness.
sentences.chinese: 沽身自好，杜绝不正当性行为，是预防本病的关锐。

sentences.english: Prolonged labor, postpartum hemorrhage and infection may be eliminated.
sentences.chinese: 并且杜绝了滞产，产后出血及产后感染。

sentences.english: New design of protection against outrunning liquid, eliminate internal liquid outrunning .
sentences.chinese: 全新防泄漏设计，根本杜绝机内渗漏。

sentences.english: Forbid prize the valve board with the hard stick entering the valve cavity.
sentences.chinese: 杜绝用硬棒伸入阀腔撬阀板。

sentences.english: The new criteria would remove the most hazardous products from the food chain altogether.
sentences.chinese: 新标准将彻底杜绝毒性最大的农药污染食物链。

sentences.english: The Bahá'í writings emphasize the essential equality of human beings, and the abolition of prejudice.
sentences.chinese: 巴哈伊教典强调人在本质上是平等的，杜绝偏见。
